name: Lemongrass
uses: Aids digestion, reduces anxiety, and has antibacterial properties.
climate: Warm, tropical climates with full sun.

name: Chamomile
uses: Helps with sleep, reduces stress, and soothes stomach issues.
watering: Regular watering but allow soil to dry between waterings.

name: Rosemary
uses: Improves memory, supports digestion, and has anti-inflammatory properties.

name: Thyme
uses: Boosts immunity, helps with respiratory issues, and has antibacterial properties.

name: Ginseng
uses: Boosts energy, reduces stress, and improves cognitive function.
soil: Loamy, well-drained soil rich in organic matter.

name: Dandelion
uses: Supports liver health, aids digestion, and has diuretic properties.
soil: Adaptable to various soils but prefers well-drained soil.
watering: Regular watering but can tolerate drought.
climate: Temperate climates with full to partial sun.

name: Sage
uses: Supports brain health, reduces inflammation, and helps with sore throat.

name: Valerian
uses: Helps with sleep, reduces anxiety, and relaxes muscles.
soil: Moist, well-drained soil rich in organic matter.
climate: Cool, temperate climates with partial shade.

name: Gotu Kola
uses: Boosts cognitive function, promotes wound healing, and supports skin health.
soil: Moist, loamy soil with good drainage.

name: Licorice
uses: Soothes sore throat, supports digestive health, and reduces inflammation.
